list.title: addCSSToBody
list.description: Adds CSS files to the head of the current document.

list.title: addCell
list.description: Calls a Julia function to add a new cell, updates the cell IDs table, and displays a toast message.

list.title: addModalButtonListener
list.description: Adds event listeners to the open and close buttons of the settings modal.

list.title: callJuliaFunction
list.description: Calls a Julia function via WebSocket and returns a Promise that resolves with the return value of the function. Callbacks can be provided to handle responses.

list.title: closeSettings
list.description: Adds the `hidden` class to the settings modal and removes the `flex` class to hide it.

list.title: error
list.description: Logs an error message to the console with a specific prefix.

list.title: error
list.description: Logs an error message to the console with the PlutoBoard.jl prefix

list.title: findCell
list.description: Finds a cell by its ID, highlights it, and displays a toast message.

list.title: info
list.description: Logs an informational message to the console with a specific prefix.

list.title: info
list.description: Logs an informational message to the console with the PlutoBoard.jl prefix

list.title: insertHTMLToBody
list.description: Inserts the HTML document created by the user into the body and head of the current document.

list.title: insertSettingsHTMLToBody
list.description: Inserts the settings HTML document into the body of the current document.

list.title: openSettings
list.description: Removes the `hidden` class from the settings modal and adds the `flex` class to display it.

list.title: placeAlliFrames
list.description: Places all iFrames needed by the user in index.html.

list.title: placeAlliFrames
list.description: Places all iFrames needed given the user's index.html file.

list.title: placeIframe
list.description: Places an iframe into the specified destination div and hides all cells except the one with the given targetCellID. Also hides all Pluto elements.

list.title: placeIframe
list.description: Places an iframe in a specific destination div and hides every cell except the one with the given targetCellID.

list.title: removeCell
list.description: Calls a Julia function to remove a cell by its ID, updates the cell IDs table, and displays a toast message.

list.title: resizePlutoNav
list.description: Hides the Pluto navigation bar by setting its parent element's minimum height to zero.

list.title: setIFrames
list.description: Places all iFrames in the document once the main export is loaded.

list.title: setupWebsocket
list.description: Sets up a WebSocket connection to PlutoBoard.jl

list.title: updateAllCells
list.description: Updates all cells in the Pluto notebook.

list.title: updateCell
list.description: Updates cell in a Pluto notebook by its ID

list.title: updateCell
list.description: Updates a specific cell in the Pluto notebook by its ID.

list.title: updateCellByReactiveVariableAttribute
list.description: Updates all cells containing a specific reactive variable in their `rv` attribute

list.title: updateCellByVariable
list.description: Updates all cells that contain a specific variable. Must be the the actual variable. `variable` will not work if the cell contains `user_package.variable`.

list.title: updateCellIDsTable
list.description: Fetches the list of cell IDs from Julia and updates the cell IDs table in the settings modal.

list.title: updateCellsByID
list.description: Updates multiple cells in a Pluto notebook by their IDs

list.title: updateCellsByReactiveVariable
list.description: Updates all cells containing a specific reactive variable in their innerHTML

list.title: waitForOpenConnection
list.description: Waits for the WebSocket connection to be open

list.title: warn
list.description: Logs a warning message to the console with a specific prefix.

list.title: warn
list.description: Logs a warning message to the console with the PlutoBoard.jl prefix
